item.title: Open science award for Free Software in research 2023
item.description: We are proud to announce that the Fink team has been awarded the open science prize for Free Software in research 2023 by the French Ministry of Research! The award recognizes projects and research teams working to develop and disseminate free software, contributing to the construction of a crucial common good. These awards recognize the production of free software as a contribution and a result of research. They highlight exceptional or highly promising achievements, which can inspire both the scientific community and society as a whole.
